author: Arvin Ash
description:

REFERENCES

Paper microstructure https://tinyurl.com/2967qq7z 
Bond energies https://tinyurl.com/22pn53va
Contribution of hydrogen bonds to paper strength https://tinyurl.com/24bsmxoa
Modeling of forces cutting with scissors https://tinyurl.com/26eznsax

CHAPTERS
0:00 What if you kept cutting paper forever
0:50 What is paper made of?
1:45 Covalent bonds, Hydrogen bonds and Van der Waals forces
3:08 What happens when scissors cut step-by-step?
5:48 Do molecules get cut by scissors?
7:14 Geometry limit. Scissors aren't infinitely sharp.
8:03 How far can the cuts go? Energy scales
10:22 What is the hard stop cutting limit for scissors
10:45 How to "cut" atoms. Nucle
title: What Happens When You Keep Cutting Paper Forever?
